items.title: Stuck on "Received Baseband SHSH blobs"
items.body:
MacOS Version: 12.6.6 (It's a hackintosh, if that matters)
Model: A1459
Version I'm trying to downgrade to: 6.0.1
Device Identifier: iPad3,5

It gets stuck on "Received Baseband SHSH blobs." I waited for an entire hour but it didn't get any further than that.

Log:
Found supported exploit checkm8
Grooming heap
Preparing for overwrite
Grooming heap
Overwriting task struct

Executing payload
